buzzing about a show still some seven months away from its premiere. Among them: the hotly anticipated singing competition will award its winner a Sony Music record deal worth$ 5 million, which is being touted as the largest guaranteed prize in television history. To further differentiate the show from Idol, that winner can be as young as 12( Simon Cowell was always vocal about his distaste for Idol's age restrictions) and part of a group.
